contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 27, 1960 D Edinburgh International Contest
Edinburgh International Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
edinburgh-international-contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh March contest - 1st Ransome and Marles, 2nd Crossley Carpets, 3rd Eccles Borough. Hymn tune contest - 1st Scottish C.W.S., 2nd Carlton Main, 3rd City of Edinburgh. 12th annual contest. 10 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2011, 8:14 p.m. April 15, 2014, 10:48 a.m.
1 Carlton Main Frickley Colliery Band Jack Atherton The Frogs of Aristophanes
2 Cooperation Band Alex Mortimer Tam O'Shanter's Ride [Wright]
3 City of Edinburgh Band John Hoggans Pageantry
4 Ransome Band George Hespe Variations on the Shining River
Unknown Result Crossley's Carpet Works John Harrison Le Roi d'Ys
Unknown Result Clydebank Burgh Band Charles Telfer A Downland Suite
Unknown Result Crookhall Colliery J. J. Stobbs Wuthering Heights
Unknown Result Agnes Street Band Ernest Ruddock The Three Musketeers
Unknown Result Eccles Borough Band Edward Buttress Prometheus Unbound
Unknown Result Bellshill & District Concert Brass Dugald MacBrayne Diadem of Gold
